article.title: Rathbun Appointed to Office of the Undersecretary of Defense (Acquisition, Technology and Logistics)

tags.tag: Office of the Undersecretary of Defense for Acquisition

article.text: Jane O. Rathbun has been appointed to the Senior Executive Service and is assigned as the deputy director, defense business systems, Office of the Undersecretary of Defense (Acquisition, Technology and Logistics), Washington, D.C.
